name: GUILTY GEAR 2
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The 2D fighting phenomenon is now an intense action strategy game! Build and command your troops while simultaneously fighting alongside them to clear a path to victory in the next evolution of Guilty Gear! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
